comment._content: The Broadway Drive-In Theater is in the lower center of the photograph.

comment._content: Awesome Picture.  They were building houses on Sunnybrook Road.

comment.author: 61684441@N06
comment._content: This brings back memories of my youth. Would love to have a ground level photo of the Broadway Drive-In. My Father used to it practice hitting buckets of balls at Wee Tee Golf. There was also Farmer John's Market near there. Probably one of the first examples of a convenience store.
